Blog.post: Tarzan! urlLink What movie Do you Belong in?(many different outcomes!) brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Wat onli...wwwet cancelled...at last go east coast...boring siol!!!go bowling oso like nothing...go arcade oso like shit...at last veri tired go hame sleep until 2 something am and watch euro 2004...but todae at least something ah...go library wif ahmad to do hw...met amirah,hanisa,darren and kong cheng....then also saw salbiah and gang...went to eat at bk at the end of the day broke...got home bcome veri hapi cuz at least my mum bought me a cake...yam cake ah...tasted like the sticky balloon that you have to squeeze out of a tube and blow through a yellow tube...but ok ah...thats all ah...

Birthday 2moro at abt 8am...so excited!!!maybe going to wwwet tomorrow and possibly my cuz hu juz arrived from her skool will follow...how come im not feeling happy for myself???maybe some pple juz dun have the initiative to say happi b'day to me!!!nvm...wat shud i wish 4 2moro??? hmmm...maybe a girlfren???hehehe...haiz...thats all ah...cant take my mind off my wwwet...well...HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME!!!!!!!!!!!!

I look 'handsomer' cuz i juz had a haircut at bukit batok...hahaha.Actually veri long oredi so had to cut or bcum girl...went to 2 weddings earlier 2dae...Eh!Where are the presents ah???two more days onli u noe...dun 4get ah...send me email oso can ah...as long as u say happy b'dae to me...k ah bye..dun 4get ah!

Hi all...i went to swim at jurong wif my fren Hakim and his cousin... quite enjoyable ah...went on the slides and loved it...today went to fridae prayers then went to eat wif 2 sec 3 frens and finally took 912 where they stopped at school and i went home...quite bored todae actually...thats it i guess...onli 4 daes to my b'dae!!!send me presents by then...hahah...k bye

Wooooo.....!!!!Veri nice fo a first time on the cable car.....got to see ferries and Sentosa....after the ride i went to harbour front centre to shop...nice cheap hings there,almost all the shops got offer...saw this harley davidson shoe which was unbearably beautiful but sadly no size for me....so disappointed...after that i went to my uncle's place cuz he juz came back from the hospital after a motor accident...then at home stayed up to watch France vs. England....i love Zidane more than ever ah!!!neway woke up late cuz of that...k ah thats abt it...till we meet again

Well maybe i going on the cable car 2moro...maybe onli,not too sure...cant wait!!!Today whole day,or night,chat wif Hanisa about my blog and how to improve it...Thanx Han!!! learned alot from her...u got any tips to improve my blog pls comment...juz finished eating maggi...feeling full rite now.Oh ya...holiday hw not done...maths almost but others havent even start...haiz...dunno how to complete ah...i tink ill start on the last day of the holidays...hehe...ok then,chow!

Today is my fren,Hanisa,birthday...saw her at cwp wif some frens at timezone spying on me from behind...naughty eh...After fri prayers went to cwp... went to timezone and played a nice game of police car chase...then i bought a hp pouch at mini toons cuz i dun have one...Unfortunately after i bought the pouch,i found a nicer one which was sold at a cheaper price and regretted buying the previous one...birthday comin in 11 days time, cant wait to go to wild wild wet!!! im bored...as usual...and here is the end of this post...byez...

What's up ebelibadi!Just came back from sembawang satay club...so full...i ate tom yam mee and it was like so spicy...my parents went to jb so i am wif my sis...watching o.c now...abt to finish though...quite bored actually;no nice tv shows,no one to tok to;juz me and myself...i'm talking crap now cuz im tired...so nites to all...bye

We meet again...i didnt have time to write yesterday b'cos i went to west coast after visiting my uncle at NUH...Nothing to do todae but i tink im goin to wild wild wet soon...hehehe...anyone wanna follow???I actually just turned off my radio after listening to Morning Madness on perfect10...i listen almost everyday...u shud check it out too...ok then...think thats about it...tata

Hi...this is my first time writing so i dunno wad to sae...i just came back yesterday from a stay at jb's Eden Garden Hotel which was so near to Senoko Power Station that i can smell the smoke...i cud even get Singtel connection from the hotel room...actually got the five star hotel for onli $50...Well,did nothing todae...woke up at 2:30 i tink...then ate durian from my grannys house yesterday,now veri hot...haiz.Neway got a nice sms...Thats all i can say for this posting...hope i cud write more next tym...[Khairul outs]

Wtf seh...dunno y so unlucky this week...detention la...cheng yew molest la...mrs chong cry la...to date this is the unluckiest week of my life!Then tomorrow got camp for 3 days...the onli good thing of the week is that i do all my hw everyday seh...Then wtf teachers party la...to hell wif the party!hu thought of it in the 1st place ah!?!?!?nvm next week surely lucky ah...thats all ah...till next week!

Nothing special these past few days...yesterdae onli go visit my uncle at GH...he stepped on a screw and didn't noe it until he got home...amazing seh!met my cousins there...quite fun ah wandered around the hospital wif nurses around us asking where we were going...haha!hmmm...oh ya!yesterdae sabo cheng yew by throwing these tadpole like things on his back and hakim made a tadpole bomb and threw it at him...then today his father come...luckily not abt the tadpoles but abt his lost wallet...he say the skool no security la wat la....belo mcm anaknye...thats all ah...sori if i long time nvr post ok???nothing to post seh...k la,bye

Hahaha....planned to watch spiderman 2 wif darren and frens but end up watching wif ying zhi and sylvia...the movie was ok ah but the first one is better...i tink there will be a spiderman 3 soon...watch the movie if u wanna noe why...sadly ying zhi's wallet went missing and she was reali upset...then the neoprint the 3 of us took together also went missing...long time nvr write...haiz...nothing to write ah and also lazy to write...well,hope yz will get her wallet back...thats all bye!
